definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf., all c. [[לאׁ]] 3 ms. [[נֶעְדַּר לָהֶם]] 1Sa 30:19 not anything was lacking to them; [[נֶעְדָָּר]] none was lacking 2Sa 17:22, Is 40:25; of ´[[י]], Zep 3:5 he doth not fail; 3 fs. [[נֶעְêָדּרָה]] Is 34:16 no wild beast is lacking. Pt. f. [[נֶעְדֶּ֫רֶת]] Is 59:15 truth has become lacking.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[לאׁ יְעֲדְּרוּ דָּבָָּר]] 1Ki 5:7 they left nothing lacking.
